original_title: Rodney Yee's Best of Yoga - 3 Power
overview: Develop strength from the inside out with Rodney's "best of" power sequences.  This dynamic yoga practice mixes the mental and physical benefits of yoga into one total-body practice that will help tone muscles and build endurance.
tagline: Lose weight, flatten your abs & build strength
title: Rodney Yee's Best of Yoga - 3 Power
